src:
Eksotisnya Pantai Lampuuk, Kuta di Tanah Rencong
06 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Niken Widya Yunita


Eksotisnya Pantai Lampuuk, Kuta di Tanah Rencong/Foto: Santi Itsuka/d'Traveler

Jakarta - Aceh memiliki pantai yang eksotis bak Kuta di Bali. Namanya Pantai Lampuuk yang terletak di pantai barat Aceh. Tidak banyak yang tahu pantai dari tanah Rencong ini. Pantai tersebut eksotis dengan pasir dan ombak yang menawan. Berikut tentang Pantai Lampuuk dirangkum dari berbagai sumber:1. LokasiPantai Lampuuk berlokasi di wilayah barat Aceh. Terletak kurang lebih 20 km dari Kota Banda Aceh. 2. Punya Ombak CantikTempat ini memiliki ombak yang cantik seperti di Pantai Kuta, Bali. Bagi yang hobi berselancar, pantai ini sangat cocok untuk kamu datangi.3. Saksi Bisu Tsunami 2004Pantai Lampuuk merupakan saksi bisu peristiwa tsunami 2004. Pantai tersebut sempat porak-poranda dan ditutup sementara untuk berwisata. Namun kini, pantai tersebut sudah diperindah lagi. 4. Menikmati SunsetDi pantai ini kamu bisa menikmati sunset yang indah saat matahari tenggelam. Jangan khawatir kemalaman, di sekitar pantai tersedia juga penginapan.5. Panjat TebingSelain dapat bermain air, kamu juga bisa beraktivitas ekstrem di pantai ini. Ujung Pantai Lampuuk berbatasan langsung dengan tebing tinggi yang terjal. Karena itu kamu bisa melakukan panjat tebing di sana. 6. Lihat PenyuSama seperti pantai-pantai di Bali, di Pantai Lampuuk kamu jusa bisa melihat penyu. Bahkan kamu ikut wisata pelestarian penyu lekang dan penyu belimbing yang mulai langka keberadaannya.Bagaimana, traveler tertarik ke Pulau Lampuuk?Simak Video "Sampah Kiriman Penuhi Pantai Kuta"[Gambas:Video 20detik](nwy/erd)
text:
The exotic of Lampuuk Beach, Kuta in Tanah Rencong
Nov 6, 2019, 09:40 by Niken Widya Yunita


The exotic of Lampuuk Beach, Kuta in Tanah Rencong / Photo: Santi Itsuka / d'Traveler

Jakarta - Aceh has exotic beaches like Kuta in Bali. It's called Lampuuk Beach, located on the west coast of Aceh. Not many people know the beaches of this Rencong land. The beach is exotic with charming sand and waves. The following about the Lampuuk Beach is summarized from various sources: 1. Location The Lampuuk Beach is located in the western region of Aceh. Located approximately 20 km from the city of Banda Aceh. 2. Have Beautiful Waves This place has beautiful waves like at Kuta Beach, Bali. For those who like to surf, this beach is perfect for you to visit. The 2004 Tsunami Mute Witness The Lampuuk Beach was a silent witness to the 2004 tsunami. The beach was in ruins and temporarily closed for a tour. But now, the beach has been beautified again. 4. Enjoying Sunset On this beach you can enjoy a beautiful sunset when the sun sets. Do not worry too late, around the beach are also available lodging.5. Rock Climbing In addition to playing water, you can also have extreme activities on this beach. The tip of Lampuuk Beach is directly bordered by steep cliffs. Therefore you can do rock climbing there. 6. See Sea Turtles like the beaches in Bali, in Lampuuk Beach you can also see turtles. Even you take a tour of preservation of turtles and leatherbacks, which are becoming scarce. How, traveler is attracted to Lampuuk Island?
